desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Debit Transaction code to be used on the Position Account STMT.ENTRY.
A Valid Transaction Code.
The key to this record is the COMPANY id. In a multi-book environment it will be necessary to create a separate record for each lead company in existence
Valid Company Code
Description of the POSITION.PARAMETER table
Alpha numeric field
Category code for the FXSP (contingent) position account
A valid category code in the range 10000 – 19999
Credit Transaction code to be used on the Position Account STMT.ENTRY.
A Valid Transaction Code.

The use of the field ENT.TYPE in the EB.POSITION.PARAMETER is to allow for the accrual transactions to be posted to a different dealer desk for Position accounts thus you can enter ACC which is an overall request and then you can enter ACC-MM which means that for MM you wish to do something different. The field is used in conjunction with fields CHANGE.DD and DEALER.DESK
First one should be ACC and only when it is multi valued should it be ACC-SYSTEM.ID
Dealer Desk to be used for accruals
Must be a valid Dealre Desk.
Used to exclude spec entries with txn code as RVN. If set to YES, then the RE section will not be printed in the TXN.JOURNAL report.
Possible values YES_NO and Null
Category code for the FXFWD (contingent) position account
A valid category code in the range 10000 – 19999
Debit Transaction code to be used on the Position Account STMT.ENTRY.
A Valid Transaction Code.
Credit Transaction code to be used on the Position Account STMT.ENTRY.
A Valid Transaction Code.
Category code for the AL (non contingent) position account
A valid category code in the range 10000 – 19999
Category code for the ALFWD (contingent) position account
A valid category code in the range 10000 – 19999
POSTYPE should be a valid entry in FX.POS.TYPE. This is used to form position accounts based on the currency market and position types populated in the entries.
Option to change the Dealer Desk values..
Valid options YES, NO
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a multi valued field.
Contains details of any override applicable to this record.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered. This is a NOINPUT field.
